text: Jun Kondō (近藤 淳 Kondō Jun, 6 February 1930 – 11 March 2022) was a Japanese theoretical physicist. He was known for his research that led to the creation of the Kondo effect, Kondo insulator and the Kondo model. He was an emeritus fellow of the National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology (AIST). Kondō was born in Tokyo, Japan. Kondō died on 11 March 2022 in Tokyo from pneumonia, aged 92.物理学者の近藤淳さん死去 92歳 文化勲章受章 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Japanese physicists Category:Scientists from Tokyo Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Jun Kondō
